oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A Comparison of Prophylactic Antibiotic Treatments with Regards to Morbidity, Mortality and Performance in Arkansas Stocker Cattle
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hellwig, D. H.
Kegley, E. B.
Silzell, S.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: heifer calves
tilmicosin
prophylactic
chlortetracycine
receiving ration
dietary supplement
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Eighty-eight mixed breed heifer calves (180-227 kg) were used to compare the prophylactic use of tilmicosin  Micotil®, Elanco Animal Health, Indianapolis, IN) with the addition of chlortetracycine (Aureomycin® 50, Roche Animal Nutrition and Health, Paramus, NJ) to the receiving ration from days 2-6 after arrival.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1998; 274
